## Description
Complete the optional Whisper ASR service integration so docker-init.sh reliably launches the container when ENABLE_WHISPER=1.

## Technical Requirements
- Docker container management for Whisper service
- Health check endpoint for container status
- Automatic restart on failure
- Resource limits configuration
- GPU support detection and configuration

## Implementation Details
1. Update `docker-init.sh` to handle Whisper container lifecycle
2. Add environment variable validation
3. Implement container health monitoring
4. Create integration tests for startup behavior
5. Document configuration options

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Whisper container starts automatically when ENABLE_WHISPER=1
- [ ] Container health is monitored and reported
- [ ] Failed containers are automatically restarted
- [ ] GPU is utilized when available
- [ ] Resource limits prevent system overload
- [ ] Integration tests pass consistently
- [ ] Documentation includes troubleshooting guide

## Testing Requirements
- Unit tests for container management logic
- Integration tests for startup scenarios
- Performance tests with various model sizes
- Resource usage monitoring tests

## Dependencies
- Docker API client library
- Whisper model files
- GPU drivers (optional)

Related to #1132.
